name: Space Shooter (itch) (jamielin)
description:
This is my first game using Godot. The game only have one level with three enemies based on the assets and one boss. Modified the assets to make bombs and missiles.

Controls:
Use arrow or
W = UP
S = DOWN
D = RIGHT
A = LEFT

And SPACE to launch bomb

Thank you for playing and enjoy!

Credits to:
Game Assets by ansimuz: https://ansimuz.itch.io/spaceship-shooter-environment
Music by Joshua McLean https://joshua-mclean.itch.io/free-music-pack-5
